mapper.select: select id,user_name,mail,password,create_time,real_name,status,sex from user_info where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.delete: delete from user_info where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.select: select * from user_info where 1=1 AND user_name like CONCAT ('%',#{search.name},'%') AND mail like CONCAT ('%',#{search.mail},'%') AND real_name like CONCAT ('%',#{search.realName},'%') and id not in(select user_id from user_role)
